#summary Simple Play Sound Code.


= Information: =
  This is code is the simple part of how to play the sound in unreal script. But you need to have Instigator != None for it to work.


{{{
...
var SoundCue FireSound;
...
Instigator.PlaySound(FireSound, false, true);
...
defaultproperties
{
...
FireSound=SoundCue'A_Weapon_Link.Cue.A_Weapon_Link_FireCue'
...
}
}}}
